member.name: IAppxManifestOptionalPackageInfo.GetIsOptionalPackage
member.summary: Determines whether the package is optional.
member.param: True if the package is optional, false otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestOptionalPackageInfo.GetMainPackageName
member.summary: Gets the main package name from the optional package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestOptionalPackageInfo
member.summary: Provides access to attribute values of the optional package information.
